title: Ep. 249: Busting Internet Skincare Myths with Dr. Ranella Hirsch
itunes:title: Ep. 249: Busting Internet Skincare Myths with Dr. Ranella Hirsch
itunes:subtitle: Is “fungal acne” real? Why is P50 so popular? What do TikTok skincare influencers get wrong? Are products that meet E.U. standards better? Do skincare dupes work as well as the originals? What’s the most you should pay for a hyaluronic acid serum? Are ...
description:
Is “fungal acne” real? Why is P50 so popular? What do TikTok skincare influencers get wrong? Are products that meet E.U. standards better? Do skincare dupes work as well as the originals? What’s the most you should pay for a hyaluronic acid serum? Are you layering products correctly? One of our favorite dermatologists, Ranella Hirsch, MD, is here to answers all those questions—and more. Get ready to take notes! -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Ep. 249's recap, notes, and product links: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
